item.title: American Airlines stock slides on weaker-than-expected guidance
item.description: American Airlines cited “present demand trends” and the current fuel price forecast for its guidance.

item.title: Markets are seeing a monster vibe shift, says Nomura strategist. Here’s what could happen next.
item.description: Dollars and bonds have reversed — upward pressure on stocks may come next, this strategist says.

item.title: Elevance Health earnings boost health-insurance stocks after upbeat outlook
item.description: UnitedHealth, Humana and Centene all rally premarket

item.title: Oil ticks higher as traders assess Trump tariff threats, await inventory data
China's Latest Bid to Boost Stocks Barely Moves the Needle
item.description: Authorities’ request for state-owned insurance companies and mutual funds to invest more in stocks got a lackluster market reaction.
